programme.title: Killer Couples S15
programme.desc: The sudden disappearance of a wealthy couple rattles their small town and launches an investigation that exposes a web of deception, greed, and a blood-soaked betrayal.

programme.title: Shark Tank S17
programme.desc: The critically acclaimed and multi-Emmy Award-winning entrepreneurial-themed reality show returns to spearhead entrepreneurship and inspire a nation to dream bigger.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: Hosted by Daytime Emmy Award® winning host Steve Harvey, Family Feud brings all new hilarious moments and families as they compete for a chance to win up to $20,000 by guessing the most popular answers to questions posed to 100 people surveyed.

programme.title: The Goldbergs S3
programme.desc: Adam tries to use a magic act to attract girls, but is thwarted when Beverly insists on being his assistant. Murray is alarmed when Barry refuses to study for a college entrance exam.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight
programme.desc: The foremost authority on breaking entertainment news since its debut, ENTERTAINMENT TONIGHT is the No. 1 syndicated entertainment newsmagazine in the world.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen S24
programme.desc: Chefs compete in a social media challenge. Winners race while losers make fries. With no consensus, Chef Ramsay forces the chefs to make a decision.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan decides to free Marianne and journeys to Sarawak to find his real parents. Sandokan and Marianne are captured by a rogue Dayak tribe, which happens to be Sani’s. Yanez and crew are also caught while tracking Sandokan. Forced to fight a cobra to prove his Dayak heritage, Sandokan is poisoned but survives, gaining the tribe’s acceptance. Meanwhile, Brooke and Murray defy orders and follow Sandokan’s trail.

programme.title: Killer Couples S15
programme.desc: The sudden disappearance of a wealthy couple rattles their small town and launches an investigation that exposes a web of deception, greed, and a blood-soaked betrayal.

programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit S3
programme.desc: The series continues to follow detectives Jason Grant and Nikki Batista of the Philadelphia Police Department's Missing Persons Unit (MPU) as they undertake intense searches for missing individuals.

programme.title: The 83rd Annual Golden Globes
programme.desc: For over 80 years, the Golden Globes has championed artistry in all of its forms, honoring the very best achievements in both film and television. The annual show brings the most stars together under one roof to kick-off awards season, creating some of the most talked-about moments in Hollywood — and beyond.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight
programme.desc: The foremost authority on breaking entertainment news since its debut, ENTERTAINMENT TONIGHT is the No. 1 syndicated entertainment newsmagazine in the world.

programme.title: Project Runway S21
programme.desc: The designers saddle up for a wild ride as their next challenge requires them to create a modern take on western chic.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Believing him to be the prophesied leader, the tribe’s chief, Balau, helps Sandokan uncover his past, despite his son Lang’s jealousy. As Sandokan makes progress, he and Marianne confess their love for each other. Yanez argues with Sandokan not to get involved with the Dayak’s struggle and leaves. Sandokan discovers his tribe was massacred under orders from Marianne’s father. The lovers fall out, and Brooke rescues Marianne.

programme.desc: A long-time resident of a suburban street descends into a morass of delusion, anger and paranoia that turns him against innocent neighbours; he eventually unleashes his violent wrath upon the community.

programme.title: The Titan Games S1
programme.desc: The competition continues with competitors pushing their bodies to the limit by battling opponents in unforgiving head-to-head challenges, designed by Dwayne Johnson. Winners will advance to the ultimate challenge of Mt. Olympus, the consummate athletic test of speed, strength, agility and endurance. The male and female competitors who conquer Mt. Olympus will become a Titan, and in the end, the Titans return to battle each other. One woman and one man will be crowned Titan Champions. Dwayne Johnson serves as host and Executive Producer, Liam McHugh and Alex Mendez commentate from the skybox and Cari Champion reports from inside the arena.

programme.title: The National Dog Show ('20)
programme.desc: From the Kennel Club of Philadelphia, this cherished competition for all dog lovers returns for the 17th year. Hosted by John O'Hurley, the event features 2,000 of the nation's leading canines, including the world’s largest, smallest and most exotic. Over 170 breeds strut their stuff with the hope of becoming this year's top dog. “The Dean” David Frei provides expert show commentary, and Mary Carillo chimes in as an adept sideline reporter for this ultimate canine showdown. But which dog will have their day, and which will leave with their tail between their legs? After all, there can only be one “Best in Show”.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian’s lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods

programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, as Su-jeong met her newly appointed manager, she realised he was the guy she had met 16 years ago in an online game and had fallen in love with.

programme.title: Howling Village
programme.desc: After her brother goes missing, a young psychologist visits an infamous haunted and cursed location known as 'Howling Village' to investigate his disappearance and uncover her family's dark history.

programme.title: Den Of Thieves
programme.desc: An elite unit of LA County Sheriff's Department have to stop a notorious crew of expert thieves from robbing the impenetrable Federal Reserve Bank.

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: In early 11th century China, the Song Dynasty is being invaded by armies of the rival state Western Xia. Yang, the last of a long line of Song generals, is killed and his widowed wife Mu leads other widows into battle to save their dynasty.

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: When a mysterious cell phone signal causes apocalyptic chaos, an artist is determined to reunite with his young son in New England.

programme.title: My Big Mama's Crazy Ride
programme.desc: One holiday, the eldest daughter-in-law who picked up the keys to the van, escapes with her daughters-in-law one by one without her husband knowing.

programme.title: Taken From Rio Bravo
programme.desc: In 1874 Texas, two friends and an Indian scout rescue kidnapped women from sadistic traffickers near the Mexican border.

programme.title: City Hunter
programme.desc: Extremely silly comedy about a self-indulgent private investigator who winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting
programme.desc: In the course of an escape attempt, a group of dangerous criminals aboard a cargo ship en route from the Philippines to South Korea unleash a sinister force.

programme.title: The Roundup: No Way Out
programme.desc: Seven years after the roundup in Vietnam, Ma Seok-do joins a new squad to investigate a murder case. He soon starts to dig deeper when he finds out the case involves a synthetic drug and a gang of thugs.

programme.title: Monsters: Dark Continent
programme.desc: Ten years on from the events of Monsters, and the 'Infected Zones' have now spread worldwide. The Army decide to draft in more numbers to help deal with this insurgency.

programme.title: The Man Standing Next
programme.desc: In the 1970s, Korea is under the absolute control of President Park, who controls the KCIA, the organization with the edge over any branch of government.

programme.title: Acts Of Violence
programme.desc: Three Midwestern brothers, a crime lord, and an incorruptible cop are on a deadly collision course when the youngest brother's fiancée is kidnapped by human traffickers.

programme.title: Urban Myths
programme.desc: Seoulgoedam (literally meaning “Seoul Ghost Stories”), is a horror anthology film that focuses on Korean folklore that has been passed down from generation to generation.

programme.title: Wildest Survival

programme.title: Destination China: Yunnan
programme.desc: The winter is mild and wet, which is good news for some but bad news for others. Red deer are forced to higher ground, salmon have gone six months without food, mountain hares turn a conspicuous white, and squirrels kick their own young out of the nest.

programme.title: Destination China: Yunnan
programme.desc: Reptiles, amphibians, insects and fish are found in every corner of our world - and for this special group of animals, life is regulated by the sun.

programme.title: Ainsley Eats The Streets

programme.title: Ainsley Eats The Streets

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn’t go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he’s a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn’t go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis’ backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian’s lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Marcus leaves for sleep-away camp, Phoebe discovers that being a “family fairy” means helping everyone in your assigned family, not just the children. / When Tracy hires Cassie to babysit Nicholas, and Eden asks Athena and Phoebe to lend a helping hand, Cassie and the Dews must find a way to get Nicholas to bed without his missing and beloved penguin stuffy.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Grug and Eep get into an argument and end up switching places to prove how hard it is to the other to be them. We follow Eep as the parent and Grug as the teenager at school and at home

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Society’s conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case

Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad members—Tai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tang—are involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Dee has the voice of an angel, but her huge neck hump has stolen her passion to sing. Young Eli wants to be a chef, but feels ashamed of his cheek bump and worries removing it could paralyse his face.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael prepares a flavourful Korean-style taco with a spicy, soy-based recipe that perfectly combines salty and sweet ingredients.

programme.title: Big Lies In A Small Town
programme.desc: Rachel searches for her daughter after their car crashed outside of a town. She gets closer to finding out that the town doctor kidnapped her. He and his wife never got over the loss of their daughter.

programme.title: Secret Life Of The Pastor's Wife
programme.desc: Angie, the wife of a charismatic pastor who extols family values yet maintains an icy demeanour toward his own, seeks solace from her marital woes in the arms of her recently hired pool boy.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The remaining chefs face the toughest challenge yet in this celebration of MasterChef’s 250th episode! The kitchen heats up when the chef with immunity gives each contestant an iconic cake to recreate.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Everyone loves lasagna, and Rachael shares her tips for making a delicious, authentic dish made with egg pasta and guanciale, layered with marinara and béchamel sauce.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Rachael prepares a popular Tuscan dish of red wine-infused beef stew served with creamy polenta.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Racheal teams up with her friend, chef and author, Anna Gass, to make an Italian version of fried grilled cheese, also known as a carrozza, along with a hearty roasted tomato soup.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork

As cops probe into a case, Reden meets Divine who has just arrived from the States. Though modern in many ways, her values remain conservative.

programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch in Virginia City, while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Wonder Woman E01 - Pilot
programme.desc: Wonder Woman travels to America disguised as Diana Prince, assistant to Major Steve Trevor. Using her golden belt, bullet-deflecting bracelets, a golden lasso and an invisible supersonic plane, Wonder Woman combats evil.

programme.title: CSI S5 E19 - 4x4
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E02 - Jeannie and The Wild Pipchicks
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S4 E08 - East Winds
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S4 E19 - Phantoms
programme.desc: Smart, stylish and suspenseful, MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE returns for its dynamic 4th season, captivating audiences with its glimpse into the world of international espionage.

programme.title: Married With Children S5 E25 - Buck the Stud
programme.desc: With offbeat humor and unflinching honesty, Married… With Children paints a more realistic picture of middle-class existence, warts and all for the less-than-lovable Bundys family

programme.title: Frasier S3 E01 - She's The Boss
programme.desc: In the third season of FRASIER additions to the recurring cast include Marta, Maris' maid and go-between, Frasier's son, Frederick, and Kate Costas, the headstrong, ratings-obsessed new manager of Frasier's home radio station KACL.

programme.title: Wonder Woman E02 - Wonder Woman Meets Baroness Von Gunther
programme.desc: Wonder Woman travels to America disguised as Diana Prince, assistant to Major Steve Trevor. Using her golden belt, bullet-deflecting bracelets, a golden lasso and an invisible supersonic plane, Wonder Woman combats evil.

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generations E14 - The 1960s (Part 2)
programme.desc: The dramatization of Alex Haley's family line from post Civil War America to the writer's search for his roots.

programme.title: CSI S5 E20 - Hollywood Brass
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 E22 - I Don't Remember Mama
programme.desc: Fran Fine turns up on the doorstep of Maxwell Sheffield and finds herself the nanny of Maxwell's three children: Maggie, Brighton, and Grace. Maxwell Sheffield is unhappy about it at first, but Fran turns out to be just what he and his family needed.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)
programme.desc: From exploding cars and blimp disasters to kids sent through the mail and doomed personal helicopters, the past is packed with jaw-dropping travel tales that paved the road to modern transportation.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S10)
programme.desc: Two champions return for the opportunity to go head to head against one of our titans. After facing off against a fellow champ, only one smith will remain and be tasked with making an M1917 Naval Cutlass.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: The survivalists find themselves pivoting as new challenges test their strength. One participant loses a valuable resource, while another is pushed to their absolute limit.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Jake's snowmobile breaks down in the heart of Lion Alley. Paul takes on a neighbour's beaver and muskrat problem. Kidd and Harry plow a backcountry airstrip so planes can land safely.

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: An exploration into the dark art of spycraft. From the frankenkitty to the umbrella gun, we'll reveal the deadliest spy weapons deployed to gather information and assassinate enemies.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: A German-American pilot, Dieter Dengler, uses survival skills honed as a child to escape a secret prison in Laos in the early years of the Vietnam war.

programme.title: When Magical Pet Powers Run Wild!
programme.desc: Magical Pet powers run wild! A Bubble Monster traps everyone & a sick Shrubcub makes vines grow!

programme.title: A Big Welcome for the New Magic Pets!
programme.desc: Mila & Morphle welcome new Magic Pets! They meet a pet that grows jungles & one that makes juice pops!

programme.title: Balance, A Riddle & A Pirate!
programme.desc: Rob & his friends are on an adventure! They start a giant game of dodgeball & go on an expedition!

programme.title: Hocus Pocus, A Honk & TK's Toy!
programme.desc: Rob & his friends learn lessons! A wizard must be a good listener & old toys can be recycled!

programme.title: So Many Fun Things to Discover!
programme.desc: So many fun things to discover! The kids play Jack & Jill, have a tea party & make a big puddle splash!

programme.title: A Big Playtime Sing-Along!
programme.desc: It's a playtime sing-along! Mia & Max play a fishing game, have a tea party & pretend to be puppies!

programme.title: Learning to Do the Right Thing!
programme.desc: Buster learns to do the right thing! He learns that telling the truth is best & helps save a runaway train!

programme.title: Teamwork Makes the Dream Work!
programme.desc: Buster learns teamwork makes the dream work! He works with his team to win a soccer game & escape a maze!

programme.title: Epic Rescues with Grandma Gecko!
programme.desc: It's an epic rescue with Grandma Gecko! She helps stop a runaway car & changes lots of flat tires!

programme.title: A Busy Day at the Garage!
programme.desc: It's a busy day at the garage! Gecko fixes a fire hose, washes a muddy Baby Truck & does a quiet wheel change!

programme.title: Creative Farm Adventures!
programme.desc: It's a creative farm adventure! Ella brings school to the barn, makes delicious jam & does some stargazing!

programme.title: Let's All Help Each Other!
programme.desc: Let's all help each other on the farm! The friends build a bird feeder, cheer up a sad horse & share veggies!

programme.title: An Adventure, Pedals, Rescue & Stars!
programme.desc: The Minibods go on an adventure! Lulu misses her bunny on a camping trip & Newt learns to ride without pedals!

programme.title: Drawing, Painting, Music & A Quick Fix!
programme.desc: It's a creative day for the Minibods! Newt learns to slow down her drawing & Lulu tries to make a music video!

programme.title: JJ's Yummy Food & Clean-Up Fun!
programme.desc: JJ has yummy food & clean-up fun! He makes pasta with Grandma, eats healthy fruit & gives Bingo a bath!

programme.title: How Does JJ Like to Play?
programme.desc: How does JJ like to play? He pretends to be a doctor, plays "Simon Says" & camps with his siblings!

programme.title: JJ Learns to Take Care of Himself!
programme.desc: JJ learns to take care of himself! He learns to brush his teeth, gets ready for school & visits the dentist!

programme.title: Creative Farm Adventures!
programme.desc: It's a creative farm adventure! Ella brings school to the barn, makes delicious jam & does some stargazing!

programme.title: Let's All Help Each Other!
programme.desc: Let's all help each other on the farm! The friends build a bird feeder, cheer up a sad horse & share veggies!

programme.title: A Big Day of Rescues & Learning!
programme.desc: It's a big day of rescues! The crew puts out a barn fire, saves a friend from an avalanche & fixes a clock!

programme.title: A Fun Day of Games & Construction
programme.desc: It's a day of games & fun! The crew builds a crazy golf course & has a silly sandcastle competition!

programme.title: Let's Play All The Best Games!
programme.desc: Let's play the best games with KiiYii! They play Red Light Green Light, Snakes & Ladders & Marco Polo!

programme.title: When Everything Goes Hilariously Wrong!
programme.desc: Everything goes hilariously wrong! Robot gets stuck in jelly & Princess Cat's castle fills with bubbles!

programme.title: A Super Fun Underwater Sing-Along!
programme.desc: It's an underwater sing-along! Sing about five little sharks jumping on the bed & an underwater spider!

programme.title: A Big Ocean Clean Up Day!
programme.desc: It's an ocean clean-up day! Super Shark recycles rubbish & the family builds a ball pit from recycled items!

programme.title: Fun Adventures & Sleepy Songs!
programme.desc: It's a day of fun adventures & sleepy songs! Twinkle learns animal sounds & sings a lullaby with Mr. Moon!

programme.title: Sports Day, A Rocket Band & A Bone
programme.desc: Rob & the crew get ready for a competition! They train for the Space-A-Lympics & get ready for a talent show!

programme.title: A Game Show, Unwound & Galaxy Golf
programme.desc: Rob & the crew have a busy day! They compete in a game show & must find a key to wind up a robotic Squeak!

programme.title: When Baby Daniel Causes Total Mayhem!
programme.desc: Baby Daniel is causing mayhem! He finds Arpo's remote control & makes a huge mess all over the kitchen!

programme.title: When Arpo's Imagination Runs Wild!
programme.desc: Arpo's imagination runs wild! He thinks he's a pirate, builds a rollercoaster & battles a jelly monster!

programme.title: Mom's Crazy Inventions Go Haywire!
programme.desc: Mom's inventions are going haywire! The smart house has a tantrum & a time machine creates a pterodactyl!

programme.desc: Rob & the crew are on an adventure! They hunt for pirate treasure, have a friendly race & search for a flower!

programme.title: A Hare, A Sheriff & Shellshock!
programme.desc: Rob & the crew are on an adventure! They plant veggies, play cowboys & find a shell for a hermit crab!

programme.title: Squirrel Trouble & Other Wacky Problems!
programme.desc: Arpo faces squirrel trouble & other wacky problems, like a ghost in the house & a malfunctioning music mode!

programme.title: Causing Chaos All Over Town!
programme.desc: Arpo & Daniel cause chaos all over town! They have a wild supermarket chase & a messy picnic!

programme.title: Zero Gravity, Shrink Rays & More Mayhem!
programme.desc: It's sci-fi mayhem! Arpo gets stuck in zero gravity mode & accidentally shrinks Baby Daniel with a shrink ray!

programme.title: Space Cats, Origami & A Sure Sign!
programme.desc: Rob & the crew learn new things! They learn how to take care of a cat & how to make a paper airplane!

programme.title: Space Camp, Naps & A Tall Tale!
programme.desc: Rob & his friends are on an adventure! They learn about camping & Orbit has a bad dream during a sleepover!

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 and her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert.After the discovery of a second victim, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: When an infant's body washes up on the shores of Deer Island, Massachusetts, residents rally to find out who she is, and what happened to her. Their unprecedented solidarity gets nationwide attention.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: Murders are rare in tranquil Delta Township. So when a well-liked couple is gunned down in their home, residents are terrified — until police discover the monster accidentally left a trail of breadcrumbs.

programme.title: Lie Detector: Truth Or Deception
programme.desc: Edward Ates takes a polygraph test with former FBI agent George Olivo in a bid to show his innocence. He spent 20 years behind bars for the murder of his neighbour—a crime he says he didn’t commit.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Stories of mothers and fathers who made headlines by committing crimes out of malice, extremism, and desperation.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: When an otherwise healthy woman is admitted to the hospital with sudden organ failure, an anonymous tip leads authorities to investigate a pattern of deaths in her family and a shocking prime suspect.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When the blood-smeared car of 27-year-old Stefanie Watson is found in a Maryland parking lot, her family holds out hope she's still alive.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A woman in Hancock is picked up on traffic warrants, but when she is booked, a surprising charge threatens her freedom. A belligerent man busted for being drunk in public requires medical attention.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Nanny Yoselyn Ortega had been looking after Kevin and Marina's three children. One day, plagued by psychotic thoughts and hearing voices, she snapped, with devastating consequences for two tiny lives.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters were brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. Thirty years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: August 29, 2006, Riverside County, CA. Deputies from the Riverside County Sheriff's Department respond to the scene of an abandoned vehicle in a remote area of the Gavilan Hills.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When the supposed great-niece of Marilyn Monroe, Krystal Jean Baker, 13, is found dead beneath a bridge in Texas' Bayou Country, investigators are stumped.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A shooting suspect begins cutting himself with a pocket knife after investigators leave him alone in the interrogation room; a woman breaks down after telling police that she drowned her grandmother.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A man breaks down sobbing after admitting to stabbing his mom; an actress tells detectives how and why she shot her estranged uncle; a suspected murderer tries to broker an immunity deal; and more.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Kim Edwards and Lucas Markham were both outsiders from troubled homes. They felt they understood each other when no one else did. Together they made a plan to get rid of the mum and sister Kim resented.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: After being pursued by handsome Kevin Lewis, Amanda can't wait to marry her new man. But on their honeymoon, Amanda discovers a different side to Kevin — he likes things done a certain way.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: An American Dream becomes a tragedy when San Antonio businesswoman Andreen McDonald goes missing. Four years later, her husband, Air Force Major Andre McDonald, is on trial for her murder.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When reliable 22-year-old, Molly Jane Matheson, didn't show up for work, her mother Tracy drove to her Fort Worth, Texas apartment to check on her.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Richard Ramirez terrorised Southern California in the mid-1980s, and anyone could be a target. Growing up yearning for a father figure, he found mentorship with his sadistic cousin.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Rebecca and Lee Cawthon enjoy inviting other people into their relationship — it's how they got together. After striking up a relationship with Alite, they also get intimate with her school friend.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc: Yvan Hallouin walks around Paris and its surroundings. In each stroll, the soul and identity of the 'City of Light' are examined through encounters with the local inhabitants and historical anecdotes.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils
programme.desc: Located in Bagnols-en-Forêt in the Var department, the Idéfix Farm is both an educational centre and a farm. The Lourme family welcomes visitors throughout the year. It's a chance to get up close with the 150 animals in their enclosures: a discovery for young and old alike!

programme.title: L'Épicerie
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.

programme.title: Comment Ça Va Le Nord ?
programme.desc: The North which is warming brings its share of extreme climate events, in particular water rising, for the inhabitants of Yukon. How can human ingenuity, mutual aid and Indigenous wisdom help us confront the inevitable?

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: L'Épicerie
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils
programme.desc: Located in Bagnols-en-Forêt in the Var department, the Idéfix Farm is both an educational centre and a farm. The Lourme family welcomes visitors throughout the year. It's a chance to get up close with the 150 animals in their enclosures: a discovery for young and old alike!

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Pétole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Raconte À Wanda Jemly
programme.desc: Children tell a story, a traditional tale or an anecdote to the Cameroonian author and storyteller Wanda Jemly. Smiles and emotion guaranteed!

programme.title: Raconte À Wanda Jemly
programme.desc: Children tell a story, a traditional tale or an anecdote to the Cameroonian author and storyteller Wanda Jemly. Smiles and emotion guaranteed!

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Un Dimanche À La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Before becoming a painter Pierre Sojo had a passion for drawing as an art in its own right. Today his drawings also serve as preparatory sketches prior to his painting.

programme.title: Outre-Mer Street Art, De La Martinique À Mayotte
programme.desc: Art has never been so present in the Overseas Territories. A meeting with seven artists who draw on their roots to give a unique color to their creations: Bahbou Floro in Martinique, Enos in Polynesia, Marvin in French Guiana, Virginie in New Caledonia, Méo in Réunion, B.Bird in Guadeloupe, Papajan in Mayotte.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: The Albert-Kahn museum unveils the banker's humanist project. Sometimes called ''the time folder'', Simone Pheulpin works with cotton ribbon. For his first show at Dries Van Noten, Julian Klausner plays with textures and colours. Sophie Brillouet's studio is alive with beach air.

programme.title: La Revue Culturelle 2025
programme.desc: Hats off to creatives in Québec! Here are the highlights of 2025: covering the performing arts, literature, music, visual arts, architecture and cinema.

programme.title: Dans Un Cinéma Près De Chez Vous 2025
programme.desc: Gildor Roy celebrates Quebec cinema and the creators who bring it to life. The host opens the doors to film sets, editing rooms and screening rooms, revealing the little-known stages of production. A meeting with passionate artisans.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, Émilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Métiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: After Chloe's birthday party is cancelled, Max and Phoebe compete to throw her a new one. When Max's time-stopping birthday gift falls into the wrong hands, he must work with Phoebe to stop some party poopers from ruining Chloe's birthday.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Danger Force borrows Ray's beloved Man Buggy without permission it falls into the hands of criminals Stupid Jeff and The Toddler. Now the team must track it down and get it back before Ray finds out.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Trouble follows Henry home from his superhero life when a piece of rock from outer space turns out to be more than it seems.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When Leo accidentally saves a subway station full of innocent people, he's inspired to take on a life of crime-fighting vigilantism as the Night Ninja! But has he met his match with the villainous La Fleur and her gang of dognappers?

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: The family gets stuck in a traffic jam that leads to all human civility getting thrown out the passenger side window. // Jack and Lily attempt to catch a legendary town fish despite horror stories from townsfolk who have tried and failed before them.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lil and Min both realize how similar they are to their moms and set out to distinguish themselves.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: After a misunderstanding, SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger! // When SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, everyone in town wants one! Everyone except Mrs. Puff, that is.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton closes the Chum Bucket and moves to a new town, but Mr. Krabs suspects he's still up to no good. // When SpongeBob accidentally picks up Neptune's magic trident, there's no telling what trouble he may cause!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick messes with the space-time continuum. // While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Squidina hosts a television show to pass a home economics class. // Patrick and SpongeBob try to unlock a dull child's imagination.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Star family gets trapped in the bathroom.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When Smurfette rescues Brainy from a giant snake, the other Smurfs ask her to teach them "Smurf-Fu." // When everyone is tired of changing Baby's diapers, Handy decides to invent a robot that will do the job.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Hefty casts a spell which accidentally turns him into a colossal nose that sucks up everything in its path! // After catching Clumsy, Gargamel tempts him with a magic amulet that makes his clumsiness disappear.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: After a magician hypnotizes Bobby into thinking he's a cat, the family needs to snap him out of it! // Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Bruno's hot dog cart?

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Ellie & the kids investigate cryptic Mrs. Withers. When Jack goes missing in her creepy home, Ellie and Lil must save him! // Eager to become Master Criminals, Lil & Jack help Chuck with his "dirty laundry". But are they ready for a life of crime?

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Dirk is wrongfully accused of stealing a Canyon Valley landmark so Min comes out of lawyer retirement to help him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When worms move in to SpongeBob's holes, it's up to him to hide his disgusting new friends from everyone else.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward's prankster dad visits and brings all sorts of gags with him (much to Squidward's annoyance). // Plankton tries to get a taste of the secret formula by attaching himself to SpongeBob's tongue.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: After hearing about a contest to find El Falcon's next sidekick, Carl becomes El Pollito and tries to win! Once Carlitos falls asleep, Carl and CJ must conduct all their playing - and fighting - in absolute silence!

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: When Halmoni chooses Jack over Lil to be her Trot dance competition partner, jealous Lil seeks revenge. / Min asks Jack to run a simple errand, but Charlie the gibbon intervenes, sending Jack and Lil chasing after him into the town's abandoned mines.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lily introduces Jack to her favorite video game, but when he keeps losing, Jack binges the game and turns into a toxic troll. // Slice of life vignettes that illustrate the modern-day family dynamic.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Dylan stumbles across Charlie's secret hideout. Myles, Yasmine, and Viola must deal with a constant disturbance.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: A new super-fast villain is wreaking havoc in Secret Shores, and Billy is the only hope at tracking her down. After Billy's speed accidentally triggers an avalanche, however, he decides to hang up his cape and retire from being a superhero.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe attend Parent-Teacher Night, leaving Chloe and friends home without adult supervision. When Jinx finds the Air Lair, he believes spies are targeting the school, and his meddling puts the Thundermans' school jobs at risk.

programme.title: Danger Force
